Class InputCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.Controller.Adrenalina.InputCheck

extends java.lang.Object
    This class analyzes the input strings provided by the user.

      • checkMapInput

        public static boolean checkMapInput(java.lang.String input)
        Returns:

      • directionCheck

        public static boolean directionCheck(java.lang.String input)
        Returns:
        true if the player sent an input of the four allowed: "alto" "basso" "sinistra" "destra".

        public static boolean checkSkullsInput(java.lang.String input)

      • yesOrNo

        Returns:
